Speaking of software robots and competitions between
them, do you all know about RARS?  (Robot Auto Racing
Simulation)  That's a fairly difficult challenge, but
at least one ANN-based controller did pretty well in
it.  It was by Remi Coulom, who also included it in
his Ph.D. dissertation.

This software has been around since 1995 and is in
C++.
I will admit to a special interest in it, since I was
the founder, although I have not participated since
1996.  Others carry on with the project.  It is now
under the sourceforge umbrella.

=====
Mitchell Timin
http://annevolve.sourceforge.net
